description.original: View daily notes in a journal-like format, similar to Logseq. It enhances note organization and facilitates better reflection by consolidating daily notes into a continuous journaling view.
description.translation: 以类似日志的格式查看每日笔记，类似于Logseq。它通过将日常笔记整合到连续的日志视图中，增强了笔记组织并促进了更好的反思。

dict.text:'Ensure file names within folders a: text:'确保文件夹中的文件名符合“日期格式”'
dict..setDesc(\"Specifies the filename for th: .setDesc("指定日志视图文件的文件名。此文件将用于列出和组织您的日记条目。")
dict..setDesc(\"The daily notes located in th: .setDesc("位于这些路径中的每日笔记将可通过日志视图访问。")
dict..setDesc(\"Choose how the plugin display: .setDesc("选择插件如何根据日期显示日记条目。")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the interval at which the: .setDesc("设置插件扫描目录以查找更改的间隔。间隔以秒为单位指定。")
dict..setPlaceholder(\"Folder paths separated: .setPlaceholder("用逗号分隔的文件夹路径，例如：path1/path2,path3,path4")
